Models

  • Classes in Models used by Adapter
    Class
    Description
    WarMap
    This class describes information stores a WarMap to be used in the game, it's main use is to store the countries, continents and adjency list of neighbouring countries It also contains the functions for validating, saving and showing the game map.
  • Classes in Models used by Controller
    Class
    Description
    Player
    This class describes information about each player and the order that were issued using the logic present in the same class.
    WarMap
    This class describes information stores a WarMap to be used in the game, it's main use is to store the countries, continents and adjency list of neighbouring countries It also contains the functions for validating, saving and showing the game map.
  • Classes in Models used by Models
    Class
    Description
    Continent
    This is the continent class, it contains the structure of a Continent to be used in the WarMap, it also contains the army bonus to be used during the game.
    Country
    This class describes information about each country, including the contained armies and neighbouring countries.
    Player
    This class describes information about each player and the order that were issued using the logic present in the same class.
